item.title: Why Kotler’s Marketing Principles Still Ring True in the Age of AI
item.description: Powerful brands in the future will be those that use AI to amplify human meaning rather than automate it away.

item.title: How Technical Professionals Can Anticipate and Handle Tough Questions
item.description: Position yourself not just as a technical expert, but as a trusted professional who can bridge the gap between complex ideas and business value.

item.title: 4 Smart Risk-Taking Principles Every Entrepreneur Should Know
item.description: Business is about taking risks, but not every risk is smart.

item.title: When Ego Gets in the Way of Leadership
item.description: Ego isn’t the problem. Rather, the natural human identification with it is.

item.title: Why You Should Add Walking—Backward—to Your Exercise Routine
item.description: Walking is good for you, but here’s why walking backward might be even better. Just try not to fall. Or laugh.
